Package Protocol

Class Protocol

java.lang.Object
Protocol.Protocol
public class Protocol
extends java.lang.Object

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Protocol.MessageIdentifier
    The MessageIdentifiers also known as "commands", give the context to each message.
    static class  Protocol.ShipId
    Letters that represent the ship class when sending a board.

  • Method Details

    • protocolMessage

      public static java.lang.String protocolMessage​(java.lang.Object[] objects)
      Used by this class to code an array of Objects into an protocol acceptable String that can be sent with (for example) a PrintWriter between client and server. if an Object in the array, is an array itself it will be unrolled into the format for arrays. if not the toString method of the object will be appended.
      Parameters:
      objects - the array of Objects to encode.
      Returns:
      a protocol String that can be sent.

    • decodeProtocolMessage

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> decodeProtocolMessage​(java.lang.String string)
      This method is used by this class to decode a String received by either the client or the server and use it in the Game logic.
      Parameters:
      string - the protocol string.
      Returns:
      the array of objects that were

      public static java.lang.Object[] parseArray​(java.lang.String segment)
      parses array from a string.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      an array of objects.

    • encodeArray

      public static java.lang.String encodeArray​(java.lang.Object[] array)
      encodes an array into the protocol's format. checks if the array is 1-dimensional or 2-dimensional.
      Parameters:
      array - the array to encode.
      Returns:
      the array as a string.

    • encode1DArray

      public static java.lang.String encode1DArray​(java.lang.Object[] array)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the created string that represents the array.

    • join

      public static java.lang.String join​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Boolean radarEnabled, java.lang.Boolean lobbyEnabled)
      join message. used by client.
      Parameters:
      name - the players name.
      radarEnabled - does client support radar.
      lobbyEnabled - does client support lobby.
      Returns:
      a protocol message with the name and game options

    • success

      public static java.lang.String success()

      Returns:
      a protocol success message.

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • hit

      public static java.lang.String hit​(java.lang.Integer value, java.lang.Integer attacker, java.lang.Integer receiver, java.lang.Integer[] coordinate)
      Hit message, reports results of move. sent by server.
      Parameters:
      value - the result, {-1: invalid, 0: miss, 1: hit, 2: sunk}
      Returns:
      a protocol hit message.

    • end

      public static java.lang.String end​(java.lang.Integer winner)
      message sent by server at endgame.
      Parameters:
      winner - the id of the winner or -1 for disconnected player.
      Returns:
      a protocol endgame message.

    • chat

      public static java.lang.String chat​(java.lang.String playerName, java.lang.String message)
      Used by both client and server to send messages.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player that is sending the message.
      message - the content of the message.
      Returns:
      a protocol message used to send a chat.

    • radarRequest

      public static java.lang.String radarRequest​(java.lang.Integer[] coordinate)
      request radar. sent by client.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the central coordinate of the area to be revealed.
      Returns:
      a protocol radar request message.

    • radarResponse

      public static java.lang.String radarResponse​(java.lang.String[][] boardSection)
      radar response. sent by server.
      Parameters:
      boardSection - board of the opponent.
      Returns:
      a protocol radar response message

    • getPlayers

      public static java.lang.String getPlayers()
      asks for a list of players connected to the lobby from the server. sent by the client.

    • playerList

      public static java.lang.String playerList​(java.lang.String[] playerList)

      Returns:
      a protocol player list message.

    • choosePlayers

      public static java.lang.String choosePlayers​(java.lang.String[] players)
